message: Let's be fair, Bob.  This gives us a good split.

Alice, my turn.  I believe in fairness too, so I'm offering you the same deal, but with us reversed.  It's a good offer, especially considering the inflation working against you.  Take it while you can.
Bob, that's not how this works.  I'm losing money every round, remember?  This offer is still generous, but I need to factor in the inflation.
Alice, I understand the inflation puts you in a tough spot, but so does your previous offer for me. This offer reflects the changing value of the money. It's time to be realistic.
Bob, we're running out of time.  This offer is a compromise, and it's the best you'll get considering the circumstances. Let's be reasonable and end this.
Alice, the clock is ticking and every round hurts you more than it hurts me. This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any more stalling and we both lose!
